message.body: We're all still sober... what up with that?
Speak for yourself dude! what are you doing?
I got left home alone so I'm drinking alone :(
Well stop doing that and find a way down to the city! I want to hang out!
Well I if I knew earlier I would have :( now I'm here alone and can't drive like this
Hey sorry about last night. Are you free at all today and or tomorrow. We're gonna do a BBQ on Sunday
